name: chief

chief adjective [before noun]
(MOST IMPORTANT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 most important or main: The chief problem we have in the area now is the spread of disease. The weather was our chief reason for coming here.
More examplesFewer examplesMy chief concern is to prevent any spread of the disease.Coffee and rice are the country's chief exports.Cars are the chief reason for the city's pollution levels.You must try to relax and not to worry - that's the chief thing.The chief suspect for the robbery is a Caucasian male.
